name: NontuberculousMycobacteriaInfectionPulmonaryTestsForMycobacteriumSpeciesInLowerRespiratorySpecimenExcludingSputumByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Nontuberculous Mycobacteria Infection, Pulmonary (Tests for Mycobacterium species in Lower Respiratory Specimen [Excluding Sputum] by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Mycobacterium species by culture and identification methods in lower respiratory specimens (excluding sputum).),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Mycobacterium spp, lower respiratory specimens),(Exclusion Criteria: Mycobacterium tuberculosis, sputum)
